So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google's CEO by co-founder Larry Page( Alert).
